Welcome to CatChemi’s documentation!¶

Perform the Newns-Anderson model calculations.

class norskov_newns_anderson.NewnsAnderson.NewnsAndersonNumerical(Vak: float, eps_a: float, width: float, eps_d: float, eps: list, Delta0_mag: float, eps_sp_max: float = 15, eps_sp_min: float = - 15, precision: int = 50, verbose: bool = False)¶

Perform numerical calculations of the Newns-Anderson model to get the chemisorption energy.

Vak: float

Coupling matrix element

eps_a: float

Energy of the adsorbate

eps_d: float

Energy of the d-band

eps: list

Energy range to consider

width: float

Width of the d-band

k: float

Parameter to control the amount of added extra states

calculate_energy()¶

Calculate the energy from the Newns-Anderson model.

calculate_filling() → float¶

Calculate the filling from the metal density of states.

calculate_occupancy()¶

Calculate the density of states from the Newns-Anderson model.

create_Delta0_arb(eps) → flint.acb¶

Create a function for Delta0 based on arb.

create_Delta0_reg(eps) → float¶

Create a function for Delta0 based on regular python.

create_Delta_arb(eps) → flint.acb¶

Create a function for Delta based on arb.

create_Delta_reg(eps) → float¶

Create a function for Delta for regular manipulations.

create_Lambda_arb(eps) → flint.acb¶

Create the hilbert transform of Delta with arb.

create_Lambda_prime_arb(eps) → flint.acb¶

Create the derivative of the hilbert transform of Lambda with arb.

create_Lambda_reg(eps) → float¶

Create the hilbert transform of Delta for regular manipulations.

create_adsorbate_line(eps)¶

Create the line that the adsorbate passes through.

create_dos(eps) → flint.acb¶

Create the density of states.

create_energy_integrand(eps)¶

Create the energy integrand of the system.

create_reference_eps(eps)¶

Create the reference energy for finding Delta and Lambda.

find_poles_green_function()¶

Find the poles of the green function. In the case that Delta=0 these points will not be the poles, but are important to pass on to the integrator anyhow.

get_Delta_on_grid() → numpy.ndarray¶

Get Delta on supplied grid.

get_Lambda_on_grid()¶

Get Lambda on supplied grid.

get_dos_on_grid() → numpy.ndarray¶

Get the density of states.

get_energy() → float¶

Get the hybridisation energy.

get_energy_diff_on_grid()¶

Get the line eps - eps_a on a grid.

get_occupancy() → float¶

Get the occupancy of the single particle state.

class norskov_newns_anderson.NewnsAnderson.NorskovNewnsAnderson(width: list, eps: list, eps_a: float, Vsd: list, eps_sp_min: float = - 15, eps_sp_max: float = 15, Delta0_mag: float = 0.0, precision: int = 50)¶

Class for fitting parameters for the Newns-Anderson and the d-band model with calculations performed with DFT. The class expects all metal quantities for a particular eps_a (adsorbate) value.

fit_parameters(args, eps_ds)¶

Fit the parameters alpha, beta
